title: Who's Afraid of Opera?: La Traviata/Daughter of the Regiment
brief_description: On this video, Joan Sutherland performs mini-versions of Verdi’s La Traviata’ and Donizetti’sDaughter of the Regiment’. Sutherland first introduces the story of each mini-opera to her three puppet friends. Then, backed by the London Symphony Orchestra conducted by Richard Bonynge, and a first rate cast, she moves onto the opera stage, complete with elaborate sets and elegant costumes.
